plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.A défaut, il faudra reprendre la totalit: Otherwise, you will have to repeat the entire procedure
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Les identifiants par défaut sont admin\/: The default credentials are admin / admin

plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.il faut bien les garder en mémoire ils v: they must be kept in memory they will be asked for during an SSH connection

plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.cocher \"Écran\", ceci ne sert à rien su: check "Screen", this is useless on the Jeedom image (apart from overconsumption)
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.L'adresse ip de votre Jeedom sur la Free: The IP address of your Jeedom on the Freebox Delta is written at the top, under its name
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Les login et mot de passe par défaut son: The default login and password are admin / admin when you access jeedom via your browser
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Si vous voulez découvrir Jeedom sans ris: If you want to discover Jeedom without risk, you can also virtualize it on your PC, here is the procedure to follow

plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Cliquez sur nouvelle et renseignez les c: Click on new and fill in the fields as below
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Cliquez sur suivant, adapter la taille d: Click on next, adapt the memory size in relation to your system (1024 are sufficient)
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Cliquez sur suivant, créer un disque vir: Click next, create a virtual disk now
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Cliquez sur suivant, Choisissez une tail: Click on next, Choose a size for the space (4GB is enough)
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Sélectionnez ensuite réseau et choisisse: Then select network and choose "bridge access" in network access mode
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Installez la debian de préférence sans i: Install the debian preferably without graphical interface because useless
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Dans la plupart des écrans, il suffit de: In most screens, you just have to validate the default choice
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Vous pouvez laissez des champs vides, ce: You can leave empty fields, it is not blocking
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Pour Grub, pas d'inquiétude, le secteur: For Grub, do not worry, the boot sector is that of the VM, not that of your PC. No risk of breaking anything
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Identifiez-vous avec l'utilisateur et le: Identify yourself with the user and password chosen during installation
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Saisissez le mot de passe root défini pe: Enter the root password set during installation
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Récupérez le script jeedom, le rendre ex: Get the jeedom script, make it executable, launch it
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Pour connaitre l'adresse Ip Lan de la VM: To know the Ip Lan address of the VM
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Il vous suffit de la saisir dans votre n: Just enter it in your browser
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Si cela ne fonctionne pas, vous n'avez p: If this does not work, you have not configured your network card as Network Bridge as indicated at the start
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Attention, nous partons ici du principe: Please note, we assume here that you are already familiar with Docker
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Pour découvrir Jeedom, vous pouvez aussi: To discover Jeedom, you can also rotate it in a Docker container
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Docker est maintenant disponible sur tou: Docker is now available on all recent distributions
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Pour l'installer sur une distribution: To install it on a distribution
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Vous pouvez aussi installer mysql direct: You can also install mysql directly on the host machine, in this case, skip this step
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.le nom du conteneur mysql: the name of the mysql container
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.le dossier de l'hote ou l'on doit stoker: the file of the host where we have to store MySql data
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.le mot de passe root de l'instance MySql: the root password of the MySql instance
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.répertoire où les données de Jeedom sont: directory where Jeedom data is put on the host
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.mot de passe root pour accéder à Jeedom: root password to access Jeedom in SSH
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Il vous faut ensuite installer Jeedom en: Then you need to install Jeedom by going to
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.9080 et entrer les informations de conne: 9080 and enter the connection information to mysql
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Pour le nom de l'hote MySql, il faut met: For the name of the host MySql, you have to put jeedom-mysql
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Vous trouverez ici la documentation pas: Here you will find the documentation step by step to install Jeedom on a Synology (DSM 5
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Cliquez sur tous, puis installez le paqu: Click all, then install the Docker package
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Attendez jusqu'à ce que l'installation s: Wait until the installation is finished
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Pour avoir accès au paquet Docker, il fa: To access the Docker package, you must have DSM 5
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Récupération et installation des images: Recovery and installation of Jeedom images
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Il faut Docker pour faire tourner Jeedom: You need Docker to run Jeedom, the first one Docker Mysql which will contain the database and a second one which contains Jeedom
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Dans le champ de recherche tapez \"mysql: In the search field type "mysql", select mysql and click on download
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Validez ensuite la demande de version, l: Then validate the version request, the best being to take the latest version
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Cliquez ensuite sur image, ici vous pouv: Then click on image, here you can follow the progress of the download (can take several tens of minutes)
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Une fois terminé, cliquez sur l'image pu: Once finished, click on the image then launch
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Donnez un nom à votre mysql ainsi qu'un: Give a name to your mysql as well as a local port redirected to port 3306 of the container, then do the following
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Puis sur \"Ajouter un dossier\", et là,: Then on "Add a folder", and there, put the desired folder on the Synology side (it is in this folder that there will be all the files in the database) and / var / lib / mysql on the container side (be careful uncheck "Read only")
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Cliquez sur \"Environnement\" puis \"Ajo: Click on "Environment" then "Add a variable" and putting in "Variable
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.MYSQL\\_ROOT\\_PASSWORD\" et dans valeur: MYSQL\_ROOT\_PASSWORD "and in value put the desired BDD password (it will be used later)
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Cochez \"Exécuter ce conteneur lorsque l: Check "Run this container when the wizard has finished" then click on "Apply
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Dans le champ de recherche, tapez \"jeed: In the search field, type "jeedom", select jeedom / jeedom and click on download
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Validez ensuite la demande de version, l: Then validate the version request, the best being to take the last
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Une fois terminé, cliquez sur l'image pu: Once finished, click on the image then launch
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Donnez un nom à votre jeedom ainsi qu'un: Give a name to your jeedom as well as a local port redirected to port 80 (here 9080) and one to 22 (here 9022) of the container, then do the following
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Choisissez un dossier sur votre Synology: Choose a folder on your Synology (it is in this folder that there will be all jeedom files), be careful to uncheck "Read only
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Dans chemin d'accès, mettez \/var\/www\/: In path, put / var / www / html then click on "Environment
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Cochez \"Exécuter le conteneur à l'aide: Check "Run the container using elevated privileges" then validate everything
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Il existe 3 paramètres optionnel de conf: There are 3 optional configuration parameters, these parameters must be passed as an environment variable
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.permet de changer le port par défaut (80: allows to change the default port (80) for listening to the web server
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.permet de changer le port par défaut (22: allows to change the default port (22) for listening to ssh
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.indique que le résaux est en mode host: indicates that the network is in host mode
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Certain plugin on besoin d'avoir le broa: Certain plugin you need to have the network broadcast (Xioami plugin type), for that you must ABSOLUTELY switch to the network in host mode (only possible during creation), change the default listening port of the web server and ssh by unused ports (type 9080 for the web server and 9022 for the ssh), and set the variable MODE_HOST to 1
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Il vous faut maintenant installer Jeedom: Now you need to install Jeedom, it's very simple, go to IP\_NAS
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Remplissez les champs en fonction de vot: Fill in the fields according to your configuration (configuration of the Docker mysql installed previously) and validate
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.L'addresse IP de la BDD est l'addresse I: The IP address of the BDD is the IP address of the NAS, the port is the one redirected from the Docker Mysql, the password is the one put in the Docker Mysql
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Le nom d'utilisateur est root et le nom: Username is root and base name is whatever you want (Jeedom recommended)
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Si vous voulez un accès SSH, il vous fau: If you want SSH access, you need in ports to redirect a local port to port 22 of the container, the SSH identifiers are root / jeedom
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Vous pouvez changer le mot de passe en i: You can change the password by setting the environment variable ROOT\_PASSWORD to the value of the desired password
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Vous trouverez ici la documentation pour: Here you will find the documentation to install Jeedom on most linux systems (tested and approved on the Debian distribution)
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.7 de Jeedom (mais Jessie reste parfaitem: 7 of Jeedom (but Jessie remains perfectly functional)
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Si vous ne maîtrisez pas un minimum les: If you do not master Linux environments a minimum, we advise you to go on an official image (OVF) or the use of a Mini + or Smart (available soon)
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Le script d'installation peut être dange: Installation script can be dangerous because it assumes your system is blank
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Si ce n'est pas le cas merci de lire le: If not, please read the script and install by hand.
plugins\/\/var\/jenkins_home\/workspace\.Connectez-vous en SSH à votre système et: Connect in SSH to your system and do
